title: Frescoes in Danish churches
creator_credit: Jorgen Roos, Luciano Emmer, Teknisk Film and Dansk Kulturfilm
brief_description: Uses church frescoes to relate a biblical theme. Depicts the creation and fall of man, the devil and death, the last judgement and hell. No dialogue is spoken in this film.
